name: Genesis Noir
summary: A noir adventure spanning time and space. When a love triangle between cosmic beings becomes a bitter confrontation, you'll witness a gunshot fired by a jealous god—otherwise known as The Big Bang. Jump into the expanding universe and search for a way to destroy creation and save your love.
info:
• 发行: Fellow Traveller
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: Xbox One
